#** * Membership request response mail template * @translate This page requires full translation * @type mailtemplate * @refactored ludovic *# #if($membershiprequest) #set($memberName=$xwiki.getUserName($membershiprequest.requester,false)) #end #if($space) #set($groupName=$space.displayTitle) #end #set($reason=$context.request.get("reason"))
Dear $memberName,
Thank you for your interest in joining $groupName on Curriki.
Your request for membership has been denied at this time.
$!reason
Sincerely,
Curriki, for $groupName
